overview: Carla leads a good life with her father's money. She gets a job in the company but in exchange she will have to live on her salary alone like all her colleagues. Among her colleagues there is also Renato, a young man with whom she falls in love. However, having noticed a certain familiarity, the boy believes her to be the owner's lover and shows up at the family villa where all misunderstandings are cleared up.
title: L'impiegata di papà
